item.description:
Hi Folks,

This is more of an fyi than a meetup.

The Felix Brown Band is playing at a huge party I'm volunteering for on New Year's Eve.

This is the largest New Year's Eve party in Boston. They're expecting 2000 people and it was sold out last year.

I'm on the planning committee .... the volunteer coordinator. So, you know I'm asking for volunteers! I'm looking for people to help out for 2 or 3 hours that night with raffles, balloon poppers, greeters, hand out party favors, gift bags, registration, etc ... The volunteer jobs are easy and you'll be with people. Volunteers pay only $40 for the entire night.

If you don't want to volunteer, there are different levels of pricing, depending on whether or not you come for dinner or the party only.

The Westin Hotel is giving a huge discount of $169 for rooms that night if you mention The Resolution Ball when you reserve your room.

There's a charity involved as well ... The Ellie Fund.

It's a formal night. Guys wear either a suit or a tux. Women wear either a short or long cocktail dress. The party is open to couples and singles.

Check out the following sites for more info:

http://www.bostoneven...

http://www.elliefund....

http://www.felixbrown...

http://www.starwoodho...

Please indicate in your response if you're interested in volunteering that night. No obligation just for asking ...

If you're interested in volunteering, please send an email to Emma at nyevolunteers@bostoneventguide.com. Emma is the keeper of the volunteer shifts and job descriptions. Tell Emma that Lisa sent ya!

Cheers!

Lisa

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Resolution Ball
